name: My Fear in the Toilet
description:
When I was child I was very afraid of ghosts because I heard a lot of stories from my friends and saw horror movies on television. it scares me, especially when I enter a quiet place. and one of the scary places is in the toilet or bathroom.

Many stories and spooky scenes from horror movies that are located in the toilet. starting from the water turning into blood, suddenly there are ghosts behind and other scary things.

it makes me imagine a lot of scary things when entering the toilet or bathroom. makes me easily paranoia when washing my hair and closing my eyes. makes me rush when I have to do activities to the toilet at night.

and I think this photo illustrates that.
